entities.name: goblins
entities.description: Goblins are mentioned as having been treated brutally in the past by wizards, and they have a history of violence against humans. They are described as not being 'ﬂuﬀy little bunnies'.

entities.name: wizards
entities.description: Wizards are mentioned as having treated goblins brutally in the past, and they have a history of violence against goblins.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a specific goblin who is mentioned as being involved in an argument with Ron about whose race is most under-handed and violent. He is described as someone they need to convince to help them.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby's grave is mentioned, indicating that he has passed away. Luna is seen arranging sea lavender beside his headstone.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being involved in an argument with Griphook about whose race is most under-handed and violent.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as explaining to Ron why goblins have a reason to dislike wizards, citing their brutal treatment in the past.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is seen arranging sea lavender beside Dobby's headstone, indicating that she is paying her respects to him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as looking out of the window at Dobby's grave, indicating that he is also paying his respects to him.

relationships.description: Goblins and wizards have a history of conflict, with goblins being treated brutally in the past by wizards.
Ron is arguing with Griphook about whose race is most under-handed and violent.
